entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023
